blogPost.excerpt: Abacum is a financial planning tool for mid-sized companies. Save time by integrating data sources and automating manual processes. Generate better insights with analytical tools built for finance-users. Collaborate easily across teams and locations.
blogPost.body: Abacum is a financial planning tool for mid-sized companies. Save time by integrating data sources and automating manual processes. Generate better insights with analytical tools built for finance-users. Collaborate easily across teams and locations.
blogPost.title: Abacum - Helping finance teams deliver business insights 10x faster
blogPost.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos

localize.description: Abacum是一款针对中型企业的财务规划工具。通过整合数据源和自动化手动流程来节省时间。通过为财务用户设计的分析工具产生更好的洞察力。跨团队和地点轻松协作。
localize.tagline: 帮助财务团队以10倍的速度提供业务洞察力。

localize.description: Abacum是一款針對中型企業的財務規劃工具。通過整合數據源和自動化手動流程來節省時間。通過爲財務用戶設計的分析工具產生更好的洞察力。跨團隊和地點輕鬆協作。
localize.tagline: 幫助財務團隊以10倍的速度提供業務洞察力。

next.title: There's only inflation in things we spend money on. Otherwise, nothing. https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK

localize.full_text: 只有我们花钱买的东西才会有通货膨胀。否则，什么都没有。https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK
只有我們花錢買的東西纔會有通貨膨脹。否則，什麼都沒有。https://t.co/ZBltdtpHKK
